ideas.title: AI Medication Interaction Checker for Elderly Polypharmacy
ideas.description: An app that cross-references all medications an elderly person takes, flags dangerous interactions their doctors might miss across separate prescriptions, and suggests safer alternatives — trained on real pharmacological data.

ideas.title: Satellite + AI Crop Disease Early Warning for Smallholder Farms
ideas.description: Combining freely available satellite imagery with on-device AI to detect crop diseases 2-3 weeks before they're visible to the eye, delivered via SMS to farmers without smartphones in developing regions.

ideas.title: Adaptive Textbook That Rewrites Itself for Each Student
ideas.description: An open-source textbook engine that uses AI to detect a student's knowledge gaps from their interactions and dynamically adjusts explanations, examples, and difficulty — essentially a textbook that teaches differently for every reader.

ideas.title: AI-Powered Water Pipe Leak Detection via Sound Analysis
ideas.description: Deploy cheap acoustic sensors on municipal water pipes and use AI to detect micro-leaks by sound signature before they become pipe bursts. Cities lose 20-30% of water to leaks — this could cut that dramatically.
